name: omega
description: data driven JavaScript library, based on JSX

scripts.build: (rm -rf dist/** || mkdir dir dist) && cp index.html dist && webpack -p
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production&& rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp test/index.html dist && cp -R test/assets dist && webpack -p
scripts.test: echo  NO TESTS DEFINED! TODO: define some
